description: This file implements the main React component/page for the frontend of a connector configuration UI. It includes UI for connecting to JIRA and Confluence, handling form states, making API requests, and rendering layout components like sidebar, header, forms, and footer.

methods.name: submitJira
methods.description: Handles submission of JIRA credentials, sends POST request to backend API, manages loading and error states.

methods.name: submitConfluence
methods.description: Handles submission of Confluence credentials, sends POST request to backend API, manages loading and error states.

methods.name: safeJson
methods.description: Safely parses fetch response JSON, returns empty object on failure.

methods.name: SidebarItem
methods.description: Component for rendering navigation sidebar items.

methods.name: FormField
methods.description: Component for rendering labeled input fields.
